name: Simple Cottage Cheese Pancakes
author: Karyn Andrea
summary: These are an old favorite of mine. I use small-curd, low-fat cottage cheese. They come out thin and delicate, somewhere between a classic pancake and a crepe. A nice addition to a reduced-carb diet.
ingredients: ¼ cup blueberries, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Strain cottage cheese in a sieve fitted over a bowl, pressing down occasionally, until cottage cheese has dried out, about 1 hour
Beat eggs in a medium bowl; add cottage cheese, flour, melted butter, and salt
Heat butter in a frying pan over medium-high heat; drop large spoonfuls of batter into the melted butter
Cook until lightly browned, 2 to 3 minutes per side
